title: WildStar's already going f2p

embed.description: WildStar is going free-to-play this Fall! Get ready for a legendary party, because things are about to get wild! You can find more information about WildStar at: http://www.WildStar-Online.com/ Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/WildStarOnline Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/WildStar We're hiring: http://www.carbinestudios.com

body: God bless, my broke ass can peep it once I get an actual computer
